pos_mean_info_list.mean: 了解的；聪明的；有理解力的
可以理解的；可以了解的
被充分理解的；心照不宣的
明白；懂得（understand的过去分词）；熟悉

word_mean_info__list.difference: 从本义抓紧、抓住，引申作“理解、掌握”。
语气较弱，指对某事物或意义有充分的理解。着重有能力领域或觉察。
一般用词，很常用，指对事实或意义不仅知道得很清楚。
较正式用词，指对较复杂的事物能透彻理解其意义。
指知道某事物或某观念的大概意义，但未能理解其内涵意义，暗含一知半解意味。
指对事物已有彻底的认识，不仅知其性质、含义和细节，而且了解其内外的关系。
通常指通过他人而获得消息或情况，侧重从不知到知的变化过程。
普通用词，多指通过学习、经验或他人传播而得到知识，含直接知道的意味。

word_group.brief_definition: 清楚地明白；清楚地了解
几乎不了解；难以理解；勉强懂
理解意思；理解意义；理解的意义

bilingual.source: I am not sure that I understand.

bilingual.target: 检查学生是否理解故事。

bilingual.source: You don't have to understand every word.
But I don't understand many of the words.
You don't need to understand every word.
bilingual.target: 你不需要理解每一个单词。

bilingual.source: No, it was difficult to understand the words.

list.abstract: ①分析软件工程的工具 ②英语单词，动词，意为“理解”。
《Understand》/（理解、包容），这是Monster Tea2015年发行的《弗兰西斯》专辑里的第10首歌曲。这首歌曲以蓝调、迷幻为主，是乐队代表作品。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you for understanding. Of course I understand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你理解我。我当然理解。

yingyinNormal.en: Kid! Kid, kid, kid. Try to understand this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 孩子，孩子，你得理解我一下。

yingyinNormal.en: All right. I'm sure you understand. Yes, I do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧。希望你能理解。没错。

yingyinNormal.en: It's grownup stuff. You wouldn't understand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这都是成年人的东西，你理解不了的。

yingyinNormal.en: I understand the meaning. I don't, I'm not sure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得我理解了，但是不是很确定。

yingyinNormal.en: No, it was a gift. The prince will understand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，这是个礼物，白马王子会理解的。

yingyinNormal.en: What is it about the word "unique" you don't understand?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你对独一无二这个词很难理解么？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you know, I do understand what you're going through.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道么，我其实理解你的心情。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Pirate's talk is a bit difficult to understand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？海盗说的话让人有点难以理解。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, I understand, I mean a monkey's gotta work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不会，我理解，我是说，猴子得工作嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: It is precious to you beyond measure, I understand that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在你眼中是无价之宝我，能够理解。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, how do you feel? I don't understand the question.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是什么感受？你没理解你这个问题。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I can understand how that would make someone irritable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能理解便秘的确会让一些人易怒。

yingyinNormal.en: I understand your envy. This is a can't-miss symposium.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很理解你会嫉妒，这是绝不能错过的研讨会。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe it means something more, something we can't yet understand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许这有更深的意义，那些我们还无法理解的。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't ask questions. Don't understand the rates. Fucking idiots. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有疑问，也不理解利率。都是他妈的傻逼。没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Science? Shocking! You don't understand. This could be really big.
yingyinNormal.zh: 科学吗？真"没想到"啊！你可能不理解。这可能十分重大呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Attlee said you'd understand. Attlee, your handler in British Intelligence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾德礼说你会理解的。艾德礼，你在英国情报机关的上司么。

yingyinNormal.en: You're five, and you're old enough to understand what the world is. You have to understand. You have to understand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你已经五岁了，你已经足够大能够理解这个世界了，你必须要理解，你必须要理解。

yingyinNormal.en: What are we trying to do? We're trying to understand. Six women locked 300 Jews in a church and let them burn. What is there to understand?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们到底要干嘛？我们在试图理解。六个女人把300个犹太人关在一座教堂里活活烧死。这哪一点值得理解了？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 了解; 谅解; 体谅
得知; 据信; 认为

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 误解；曲解；曲解…的话
v. 理解；懂得；了解；默认；认识到；明了；听说；（understand的过去式和过去分词）
n. 理解；了解；谅解；理解力；判断；领会；思维能力；非正式的协议或协定

word_family.mean: v. 理解；懂；推断；猜想；以为；了解；明白；解释；不言自明；认为…理所当然

sense_info_list.en: know or realize how or why something happens, how it works or why it is important

examination_example.sentence: It is much harder, however, to <highlight>understand</highlight> their negative consequences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，认识它们的负面后果要困难得多。

examination_example.sentence: Now we can <highlight>understand</highlight> each other's positions and recognize our shared values, since we both care about needy workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在我们能明白彼此的立场，并认识到我们共同的价值观，因为我们都关心贫困的工人。

examination_example.sentence: Surveys and test samples have also become important for <highlight>understanding</highlight> the larger landscapes that contain archaeological sites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 调查和测试样本对于认识包含考古遗址的更大景观也变得很重要。

sense_info_list.en: perceive the intended meaning of (words, a language, or a speaker)

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>understand</highlight> this.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我明白这一点。

examination_example.sentence: Such actions to seek knowledge and to <highlight>understand</highlight> what information we already knew were captured.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种寻求知识和理解我们已经知道的信息的行为被捕获了。

examination_example.sentence: What motivated him, we were to <highlight>understand</highlight>, was his zeal for "fundamental fairness" .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们应该理解，激励他的是他对“基本公平”的热情。

sense_info_list.en: to know somebody's character, how they feel and why they behave in the way they do
sense_info_list.zh: 了解; 谅解; 体谅

examination_example.sentence: We neither <highlight>understand</highlight> nor respect each other, and we have no basis for compromise or cooperation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们既不理解也不尊重对方，我们没有妥协或合作的基础。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>understand</highlight> Reding's reluctance — and her frustration.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我理解Reding的不情愿——以及她的沮丧。

sense_info_list.en: to think or believe that something is true because you have been told that it is
sense_info_list.zh: 得知; 据信; 认为

sense_info_list.en: agree something with someone without it needing to be said

word_usage.usage:
understand做动词表示“听说，获悉”时，一般用于比较正式的场合，示例：
The Prime Minister is understood to have been extremely angry about the report.
据说首相对这份报告大为恼火。

understand，see，get均可以表示“理解”，区别在于：
understand指懂、理解、领会（词意、语言、话语等），了解、认识到、明白（事情如何或为何发生、如何起作用或为何重要等）。
see指理解、明白、领会（正在发生的事、某人的话、某事如何起作用或重要性如何）。
get指理解、明白（笑话、某人试图告知的事或描述的情况）

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 误解；误会；曲解；争执；不和
v. 误解；曲解；曲解…的话
adv. 可理解地
adj. 可理解的；可了解的；合情合理的；可以谅解的
n. 理解；了解；谅解；理解力；判断；领会；思维能力；非正式的协议或协定

word_family.mean: v. 理解；懂；推断；猜想；以为；了解；明白；解释；不言自明；认为…理所当然

sense_info_list.en: get the meaning of words, a language, what someone says, or others

examination_example.sentence: At other times, we personify products in an effort to <highlight>understand</highlight> them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在其他时候，我们将产品拟人化，以努力了解它们。

examination_example.sentence: The best seek to alleviate the external pressures on their pupils while equipping them better to <highlight>understand</highlight> and handle the world outside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最好的方法是减轻学生的外部压力，同时使他们更好地理解和处理外界环境。

examination_example.sentence: The public must be able to <highlight>understand</highlight> the basics of science to make informed decisions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公众必须理解科学基础知识才能做出明智的选择。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists are only just beginning to <highlight>understand</highlight> what those constraints are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家才刚刚开始了解那些制约因素是什么。

sense_info_list.en: know or realize how or why something happens, how it works or why it is important

examination_example.sentence: But while there is money available to be spent on it, the search to <highlight>understand</highlight> the secrets of ageing will be ongoing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，尽管有资金可用于此，但了解衰老秘密的探索仍将继续。

examination_example.sentence: It's easy to <highlight>understand</highlight> why people sometimes disobey procedures intentionally.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很容易理解为什么人们有时故意不遵守程序。

examination_example.sentence: They cannot <highlight>understand</highlight> directives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们无法理解指令。

sense_info_list.en: have a sympathetic attitude
have reason to believe

examination_example.sentence: Despite the huge investment into research, ageing remains somewhat obscure, although there are certain things researchers do <highlight>understand</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管对研究进行了巨大的投资，但老龄化仍然有些晦涩难懂，尽管研究人员对某些事情有所了解。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 误解；误会；曲解；争执；不和
v. 误解；曲解；曲解…的话
adv. 可理解地
adj. 可理解的；可了解的；合情合理的；可以谅解的
n. 理解；了解；谅解；理解力；判断；领会；思维能力；非正式的协议或协定

word_family.mean: v. 理解；懂；推断；猜想；以为；了解；明白；解释；不言自明；认为…理所当然

sense_info_list.en: know or realize how or why something happens; how it works or why it is important

examination_example.sentence: They should learn to <highlight>understand</highlight> family responsibilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们应该学会理解家庭责任。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Understand</highlight> the complex process of mental functioning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 理解心理运作的复杂过程。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Understand</highlight> the relation between physical and mental health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 理解身体健康与心理健康之间的关系。

sense_info_list.en: get the meaning of words; a language; what someone says; or others

examination_example.sentence: We want people to <highlight>understand</highlight> what they're eating, how to prepare it, the role food plays in their lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们希望人们了解他们正在吃什么，如何准备它们，以及食物在他们的生活中扮演的角色。

examination_example.sentence: For thousands of years, people have known that the best way to <highlight>understand</highlight> a concept is to explain it to someone else.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几千年来人们一直都清楚，理解一个概念最好的方式就是向别人解释这个概念。

examination_example.sentence: It helps students <highlight>understand</highlight> in a way that you can't do with print homework assignments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它帮助学生理解的方式，是你用打印作业无法做到的。

examination_example.sentence: What white middle-class parents do not always <highlight>understand</highlight> is how much pressure recent immigrants feel to boost their children into the middle class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 白人中产阶级父母不太理解的是，新移民将孩子推入中产阶级要承受多么大的压力。

sense_info_list.en: have a sympathetic attitude

examination_example.sentence: Something each of us can do is to <highlight>understand</highlight> deeply that the issue of poverty touches all of us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们每个人都可以做的是深刻理解触及我们所有人的贫困问题。

sense_info_list.en: agree something with someone without it needing to be said
have reason to believe

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: vt. 误解；误会；（misunderstand的过去式）
n. 误解；误会；曲解；争执；不和
v. 误解；曲解；曲解…的话
adj. 可理解的；可了解的；合情合理的；可以谅解的
n. 理解；了解；谅解；理解力；判断；领会；思维能力；非正式的协议或协定

word_family.mean: v. 理解；懂；推断；猜想；以为；了解；明白；解释；不言自明；认为…理所当然

sense_info_list.en: know or realize how or why something happens, how it works or why it is important

examination_example.sentence: Anneke <highlight>understands</highlight> how fear can get in the way of so many things people dream of doing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Anneke明白了恐惧是如何阻碍人们完成梦想之事的。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>understand</highlight> it is $800 a month.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我知道是每月800美元。

examination_example.sentence: A nurse who <highlight>understands</highlight> the healing (治愈) value of silence can use this understanding to assist in the care of patients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 了解静默治疗功效的护士都可以把此方法运用到病人护理工作中。

sense_info_list.en: get the meaning of words, a language, what someone says, or others

examination_example.sentence: As cool as it may be to receive a postcard written in Chinese, the concept doesn't work if one doesn't <highlight>understand</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然收到一张中文写的明信片会很酷，但如果一个人不理解它，这个概念就没用了。

examination_example.sentence: For postcrossing to work worldwide, a common communication language is needed so that everyone can <highlight>understand</highlight> each other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了postcrossing网站在全世界范围工作，我们需要一种通用的交流语言，这样每个人都可以相互理解。

examination_example.sentence: Adults <highlight>understand</highlight> what it feels like to be flooded with objects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成年人理解被各种物品淹没的感觉。

sample.mean: v. 低于…价格出售；切除；磨去…（尤指悬崖）的下部；下旋削；暗中破坏；底切；削弱；掏空
n. 大学本科生；大学肄业生
adv. 在地下；秘密地；不公开地
v. 在下面画线；强调；突出
v. 加固…地下基础；支持；巩固；构成…的基础
v. 表演…不充分；有节制地表演；轻描淡写；贬低重要性
v. 低估；过低评价
v. 强调
v. 低估；看轻；对…估价过低
adj. 正在进行中的；起步的；航行中的
n. 衬衣；内衣

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: "副手", 类似的前缀还有 vice-, sub-

sample.mean: adj. 发育不全的；不发达的；欠发达的；显影不足的
v. 提供资金不足
v. 轻描淡写陈述

word_usage.usage:
understand后可跟“特殊疑问词+动词不定式”作宾语：
Some people understand how to use electricity, but they don't fully understand what it is.
有些人明白怎样用电，但是他们不完全明白电是什么。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 得知; 据信; 认为

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 误解；误会；曲解；争执；不和
v. 误解；曲解；曲解…的话
v. 理解；懂得；了解；默认；认识到；明了；听说；（understand的过去式和过去分词）
adj. 可理解的；可了解的；合情合理的；可以谅解的
n. 理解；了解；谅解；理解力；判断；领会；思维能力；非正式的协议或协定

word_family.mean: v. 理解；懂；推断；猜想；以为；了解；明白；解释；不言自明；认为…理所当然

sense_info_list.en: get the meaning of words, a language, what someone says, or others

examination_example.sentence: It's much easier to <highlight>understand</highlight> the words with the help of the dictionary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有了字典的帮助，理解这些词就容易多了。

examination_example.sentence: But when she began to write, she found that she had much trouble <highlight>understanding</highlight> the reports.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但当她开始写作时，她才发现要理解这些报告有很多困难。

examination_example.sentence: I'm sorry to cut in on you, but there are one or two things I don't <highlight>understand</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很抱歉打断你，但有一两件事我不明白。

sense_info_list.en: know or realize how or why something happens, how it works or why it is important

examination_example.sentence: One basic part of ocean study is <highlight>understanding</highlight> waves and how they work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 海洋研究的一个基本内容是了解海浪及其工作原理。

examination_example.sentence: A lot of people don't <highlight>understand</highlight> wind power very well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多人不太了解风能。

examination_example.sentence: Edward quickly <highlight>understood</highlight> that these poor people were in trouble.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Edward很快意识到，这些可怜人有麻烦了。

sense_info_list.en: have a sympathetic attitude

examination_example.sentence: It's important to <highlight>understand</highlight> and learn from each other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相互理解和学习是很重要的。

examination_example.sentence: Try to <highlight>understand</highlight> what other people are facing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 试着体谅别人的处境。

examination_example.sentence: When we have different ideas, we should <highlight>understand</highlight> each other/one another.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当有不同意见时，我们应该互相理解。

sense_info_list.en: to think or believe that something is true because you have been told that it is
sense_info_list.zh: 得知; 据信; 认为

examination_example.sentence: The first group of people <highlight>understood</highlight> that the computer would store the information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一个小组的人认为计算机会存储信息。

examination_example.sentence: Now, I <highlight>understand</highlight> that you are from a planet called Zadernol?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我听说你来自一个叫Zadernol的星球?

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>understood</highlight> that different cultures around the world have different ways of showing beauty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大家都知道，世界各地的不同文化有不同的方式来展示美。

sample.mean: v. 低于…价格出售；切除；磨去…（尤指悬崖）的下部；下旋削；暗中破坏；底切；削弱；掏空

sample.mean: adj. 发育不全的；不发达的；欠发达的；显影不足的
v. 提供资金不足
v. 轻描淡写陈述

word_usage.usage: understand是表示心理或感情状态的动词，一般不用于进行体，也不用于现在完成时。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，多指通过学习、经验或他人传播而得到知识，含直接知道的意味。
通常指通过他人而获得消息或情况，侧重从不知到知的变化过程。
指对事物已有彻底的认识，不仅知其性质、含义和细节，而且了解其内外的关系。
